wikipedia_page.main:
Nicholas Bruce Archibald (born 6 December 1975 in Perth, Scotland) is a Scottish former List A cricketer. 
He was educated at Lord Silkin School, Telford, Shropshire.He was a right-handed batsman who played for Shropshire and made a single appearance for Shropshire Under-19s in 1994. His Minor Counties Championship debut was in 1997 and he made a single List A appearance for the combined team in the 2001 C&G Trophy, scoring 3 runs.

response: *Nicholas Archibald - cricketerPublished under Association of Cricket Statisticians and Historians.
